name: 3.0.0.M3
body:
- [**area/storage**] Question about postgres storage [#4681](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4681)
- [**Question**] how can i change base image from redhat into debian? [#4481](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4481)
- [**Enhancement**] Support for deterministic ID strategy to simplify recovery from corrupted registry state? [#4255](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4255)
- [**Bug**][**area/compatibility**][**area/rest-api**][**area/storage**] Improve ccompat read by contentId performance  [#4243](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4243)
- [**Bug**][**area/storage**] keycloak authentication flip flops between authentication success and failure every 5 minutes [#4231](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4231)
- [**Bug**][**area/storage**] Some message don't have MAGIC_BYTE, when use with debezium [#4199](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4199)
- [**Bug**] Issue converting ArrayNode into JSONArray while validating schema [#4125](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4125)
- [**Bug**] Keycloak REFRESH_TOKEN_ERROR [#4041](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4041)
- [**Enhancement**][**3.x**] Update to Java 17 [#4032](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4032)
- [**Bug**][**area/compatibility**][**area/rest-api**][**area/storage**] Json schema validation issue [#3891](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3891)
- [**area/rest-api**] [3.0] REST API : Make header names consistent [#3676](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3676)
- [**area/rest-api**] [3.0] REST API : Re-think the `/test` operation as a "dryRun" [#3660](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3660)
- [**area/rest-api**] [3.0] REST API : Artifacts (like Groups) are just containers with metadata [#3659](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3659)
- [**area/rest-api**] [3.0] REST API : Improve group management (should be more consistent with artifact management) [#3658](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3658)
- [**area/rest-api**] [3.0] REST API : Combine labels and properties (no need for both) [#3657](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3657)
- [**area/rest-api**] [3.0] REST API : Move the `artifactTypes` endpoint under `/config` [#3656](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3656)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/references**] Enable $ref validation for JSON Schemas. [#3335](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3335)
- [**Enhancement**][**area/storage**] Use of .well-known config to access Keycloak endpoints [#3308](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3308)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/storage**] Support a checkpointing mechanism for kafkasql storage [#3194](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3194)
- [**area/storage**][**area/rules**] How should we configure to keep the schema after restarting the apicurio deployment? [#3145](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3145)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**] Docker image apicurio-registry-mem:2.4.1.Final is not working when using Colima as the docker engine [#3057](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3057)
- [**Enhancement**][**priority/high**][**area/rest-api**][**area/serdes**][**area/rest-client**] Implement dereference functionality [#2865](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2865)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Transactional Insert of schema with refrences [#2677](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2677)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] JSON Schema diff/compatibility exception not caught (showing up in Sentry) [#2549](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2549)
- [**Enhancement**][**Beginner Friendly**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Add operation to get ALL groups in apicurio registry rest api v2 [#2196](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2196)
- [**Documentation**] Improve documentation to include how to configure Registry with Keycloak using https [#2098](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2098)
- [**Enhancement**] Support for multiple file artifacts (with file/folder structure) [#2015](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2015)
- [**Enhancement**] Kafka+SQL improve bootstrapping by one-time replication of state between replicas? [#1074](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1074)
- [**Enhancement**] Improve the Kafka+SQL serde implementations [#1059](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1059)
